body.name: Seat Cushion Pressure Relief for Long Sitting Home & Office Chair Cushion Extra-Dense Memory Foam for Support Car & Chair Pad for Hip, Tailbone, Coccyx, Sciatica Desk Chair Cushion
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs
features: 🧽 Do You Know The Ingenuity Of The Cushion Material? The seat cushion is made of soft and supportive premium memory foam as inner core. Memory foam is both soft and supportive. High-density memory foam slowly rebound to its original shape after use, preventing the cushion from flattening out. This cushion features heavy-duty, thickened memory foam to provide enhanced cushioning even for heavier users. Memory foam conforms to the contours of your body without leaving your buttocks and legs hanging, evenly distributing the pressure and weight of sitting.

👨‍💻 Ergonomics Designed For Sedentary People. The seat cushion for desk chair features a unique ergonomic cut-out design. It ensures your tailbone doesn't touch the sitting surface, avoiding discomfort or soreness. The larger size (Size-18.5*12.4*17.1 inch)ensures that the cushion wraps around your hips and the sides of your thighs. The curved surface of the chair pad cushion provides support for the buttocks and the back of the thighs to relieve sedentary stress.

💪 Helping You To Sit Free From Pain. Scientific ergonomic design with high-quality memory foam material can maximize help you relieve the pain caused by sedentary. This chair cushion can help you get rid of pain from hip and back pain, pregnancy-related pain, herniated discs, sciatica, tailbone injuries, pressure sores and numbness in the legs. Give you a comfortable sedentary experience.

💼 Do You Want To Sit Comfortably Anywhere? The size of the office chair cushion is based on the size of most chairs, so you don't have to worry about whether the cushion will fit your chair. If you want to enjoy the comfort of high-quality seats even in office chairs, wheelchairs, car seats, airplane seats, stadium seats, outdoor seats, game chairs, dining chairs, etc, then this cushion is a perfect choice. This cushion will bring you instant comfort.

🔍 Effective Detailing Can Dramatically Improve Customer Happiness With A Product. The cover of the car seat cushion is made of ultra-soft, skin-friendly fabric for maximum comfort, and is machine washable to make life easier. Non-slip particles on the bottom prevent the cushion from sliding on the chair, eliminating the need to always adjust the position of the cushion.

🎁 Helping You With Your Gift-giving Worries. Are you still struggling with what to give as a gift? Are you still picking out a New Year's Day gift, Valentine's Day gift, Mother's Day gift, Father's Day gift, Thanksgiving gift, Christmas gift, Halloween gift, or birthday gift for your loved ones? This cushion as a perfect warm gift for those who need to make a choice!

🛒 Dedicated To Creating A Hassle-free Shopping Experience For Customers. We always put our customers' feelings first. If you have any questions and dissatisfaction you can contact us in your free time, directly state your requirements, we will try to satisfy you, so that you have a pleasant shopping experience!

💡 Tips And Tricks. 1.After receive the product, please allow the mat to sit for 15-25 minutes as it slowly rises and becomes full. 2.If you want to clean the desk chair cushion, just take off the cover and wash it, the memory foam core is not washable. 3.The softness and hardness of memory foam can be affected by temperature, low temperatures can cause the core to harden, to ensure the comfort of the cushion you need to set cushion in a warm environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that it’s soft yet firm. The height is good too. I put it on the couch to try it out, but my cat is always sitting on it! She loves it … cat stamp of approval!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ## Battling the Bumps: A Review of Seat Cushions for Back and Hip Pain
reviews.reviewText: Sitting for long periods can wreak havoc on your back and hips. Enter seat cushions, promising relief and comfort. But with so many options, choosing the right one can feel like a bumpy ride. Let's break down the features of this specific seat cushion to help you decide if it's your smooth-sailing solution:**Pros:*** **Multi-purpose:** Designed for office chairs, car seats, and even gaming chairs, offering versatility.* **Pain relief:** Targets hip, tailbone, and lower back pain with ergonomic contours and memory foam padding.* **U-shaped cutout:** Reduces pressure on sensitive areas like the coccyx, potentially easing discomfort.* **Breathable cover:** Promotes airflow and helps prevent sweating during extended sitting.* **Non-slip bottom:** Keeps the cushion securely in place, preventing unwanted shifting.* **Portable:** Lightweight and compact design makes it easy to take on the go.**Cons:*** **Limited size:** Might not be suitable for larger individuals or those who need more coverage.* **Unclear adjustability:** The description doesn't mention if the cushion offers any height or firmness adjustments.* **Brand-specific:** Replacement parts might be limited to the same brand if needed.* **Price:** Potentially more expensive than some basic seat cushions.**Who should consider it:*** Individuals experiencing hip, tailbone, or lower back pain while sitting for extended periods.* Users who value portability and want a cushion for various seating situations.* People who prefer a U-shaped design for pressure relief in specific areas.**Who might want to look elsewhere:*** Individuals who need a larger cushion or require more adjustability for personalized comfort.* Users on a tight budget seeking a more affordable option.* People concerned about long-term durability or replacement part availability.* Those who have specific pain points beyond the areas addressed by this cushion.**Overall:**This seat cushion offers a blend of features targeting pain relief and portability. However, consider the potential limitations like size, adjustability, and mixed comfort reviews before making a purchase. Researching alternative options, user experiences, and comparing features to your specific needs can guide you towards the smoothest ride for your back and hips.Remember, the best seat cushion depends on your individual comfort needs, pain points, and budget. Experimenting with different options and consulting a healthcare professional for personalized recommendations can help you find your perfect match for a pain-free sitting experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Having experienced pain for some time before purchasing this product I'm amazed at how comfortable I am after sitting for some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YES!!! HUH HUH I like it! Huh!
reviews.reviewText: Oh my what a difference this seat cushion makes. Given the fact that my office chair is 7 or 8 years old. I use it everyday for work. Sometimes if for an hour or two others I’m in it for 8-10 hours with breaks of course. I need a new chair…I know. But until then, the chair’s seat cushion padding has bottomed out. At least that’s what my butt tells me and my lower back confirms.I have come to terms that I am getting older (51) and refused to be that way. But I am to the point. I need to be comfortable. So here I am!This Seat Cushion Pressure Relief for Long Sitting Home & Office Chair Cushion is been a world of difference. It’s like a cloud. So much better than sitting on pillow, for sure. I have no issues with sliding out from under me. The cushioning so far seems to maintain allowing for constant relief of pressure. The memory foam is of excellent quality, the ounce back is memorable and quick. I am able to get up from my chair, go grab a drink from the kitchen, or what ever it is I am doing, and then return to a heaven of softness. Wow! So great!!!I’m getting one of these for the truck, its so fantastic.The memory foam is of wonderful quality, like i already mentioned, great bounce back. The top and sides of the exterior pillow case is constructed of durable stretchable fabric. The bottom is stitch to the upper and side portion of the pillow case making it a one-piece cover, that is removable from the foam cushion. A zipper closure allow the cushion to be fully encased providing a sleek stylish design also presenting a clean modern look. Super ell constructed and extremely easy to care and maintain. The removable case allows it to cleaned and washed separate from the foam cushion.The cushion has a small foot print and easy to transport from office chair to car or where ever you need it. Fits nicely to any condition needed.So soft and heavenly. A relief of comfort in any situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is a very inexpensive way to have a comfortable airplane ride. For less than $20 bucks you can have some cush under your tush. It is so worth it. After traveling you can easily remove the cover to wash away the airport germs. If you have ever bought a neck pillow for a flight than getting a butt pillow is a no brainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cushion is softer than I expected so it compresses quite a bit but it does add some protection for my hips when I sit down on it. The graphics in the ad are good but in real life, it doesn’t work like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Support but Slides Everywhere
reviews.reviewText: This cushion offers great support, as it is softer than my office chair but is firm enough that I don’t feel like I’m sinking into it. My only complain is how slippery it is, even though it has a grippy material underneath. I swear every time I get up from my desk I have to readjust the cushion, which is a pain. Eventually I got tired of it and just decided to put it in my car to use from road trips instead. It doesn’t seem to slide nearly as much when I get in and out of my car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This definitely helps with prolonged sitting while working. Having hip and sciatica issues has helped to relieve the pressure while sitting. Had to adjust the chair because it does add a little height which is fine. It is great that the cover is washable, as these do need to washed at times. Cannot wait to use on a trip as the sciatica acts up more on long drives.
